verses.name: 2 Kings 2:18
verses.text: And when they came again to him, (for he tarried at Jericho,) he said unto them, Did I not say unto you, Go not?

verses.name: 2 Kings 2:19
verses.text: And the men of the city said unto Elisha, Behold, I pray thee, the situation of this city is pleasant, as my lord seeth: but the water is naught, and the ground barren.

verses.name: 2 Kings 2:20
verses.text: And he said, Bring me a new cruse, and put salt therein. And they brought it to him.
